attributes.additional_details: That the Honours Forfeiture Committee & Chairman Sir Bob Kerslake consider advising  H.M. The Queen to revoke  the Order of the Bath bestowed on  Vasiliki Pryce [Ex- Mrs Huhne] following her sentence for Perverting the Course of Justice. The Deputy Prime Minister and Parliament should also bring forward legislation to remove honours not only from Commoners but  Peers aswell who may also bring the Awards & Honours system into disrepute in line with the Representation of the People Act 1981. Two illustrations being Lord Taylor of Warwick a former discharged Judge –   a disbarred Barrister – an Expenses Peer fraudster. Lord Hanningfield Lords Expenses Fraudster.
